title: Aw Kraws
lyrics:
Kraws thu chu boral mekte tan chuan atna,
Chhandam fate tan Pathian thiltihtheihna;
Aw, Kraws, miten hmusit thin mahse,
Min chawisangtu ka chhuang zel fo ang che.

Aw Kraws, aw Kraws, Pathian thiltihtheihna,
Aw Kraws, aw Kraws ka va ngaisang che em.

Anchhedawng thing Krista thihna chu,
Ka thihnaah Lalpan min puan sak ta;
Adama mihrinna chu hlip thla in,
Krawsah ngei chuan min ti boral ta si.

Krista thihna a thi ve tawh te chuan,
Tholeh Krista nunna an chang ngei ang;
He dinhmun hi Lalpan i tan ngei chuan,
A siam che hi i haider dawn em ni.
